page.title: 11THE SCHOOL
page.content: We have a small school in Misson of 55 children.There are 3 teachers we also have 3 classrooms and a big hall which is used for a dining room and assemblies and many other things.We have a little P.E store which we keep all the apparatus in and there is also a space in there where we keep our tables and chairs .We have a little cloak room and at each side of it there are the boys toilets and the girls toilets.A pianist comes in 2 mornings a week and plays the piano so we can have singing and recorders.We have a little room called the staff room where the teachers go at playtime except for the one on playground duty.
